name: Hope (itch) (Farravid)
description:
====================     HOPE     ====================

----- Essentials -----

The Sun, family, time, nature and surviving. In this world you will be able to feel these concepts through the gameplay. Mario's mushroom? It's another funny essential.

----- Story -----
In a forest full of magic and fantasy, a little mushroom has fallen asleep after spending a whole day playing with its parents.

Upon waking up, she realizes that her parents are not around, so she decides to go look for them.

----- Mechanics -----
The game has two phases, the day and the night.
··· Day ···
During the day you have to collect the sunbeams that you are going to encounter to recharge your energy, which you can then use to defend yourself.

··· Night ···
When the night falls, the monsters that appear will come after you if they see you. You can sprint to escape faster or fire a flash of light that knocks back enemies.

But beware! At night your energy runs out little by little, so you have to find your parents before it runs out completely. And it will wear out faster if you use your skills.

The amount of stamina is reflected in the light emitted by the mushroom.

----- Controls -----
··· Pc ···
WASD = Move
ESC = Pause menu
Shift = Sprint
Left click = Beam of light

··· Controller ···
Left thumbstick = Move
Start = Pause menu
L3 = Sprint
Left Button = Beam of light

----- Bugs -----
The IA gets stuck rarely
If the IA spawns under you, it kills you
